messages.title: Making Brexit a Success is Central to Our National Interest
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to our own security and prosperity. While there is enormous opportunity for Britain as we leave the European Union, if we don’t get Brexit right the consequences will be serious. If we don’t get the Brexit deal right, your economic security and prosperity will be put at risk, and the opportunities you seek for your family will simply not happen. But with your help together we can get it right.

messages.title: This is a Unique and Crucial Election for Our Country
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security. I believe that with dedication and hard work, we can make a success of Brexit and bring our country together – building a stronger economy that creates secure and well-paid jobs, where every child gets a good school place and working people can buy homes of their own. There are only two people who can possibly be Prime Minister after the election to negotiate Brexit – me or Jeremy Corbyn. Labour under Jeremy Corbyn are a shambles and he would embarrass Britain in Brussels and risk our economic security. So the choice at this election is clear. Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest, to see us through Brexit and beyond. Or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring a strong negotiation for Brexit to secure economic prosperity and security.
Building a stronger economy with secure and well-paid jobs.
Ensuring every child gets a good school place.
Helping working people buy homes of their own.

images.caption: Theresa May and Chris Green – Strong and Stable Leadership for Bolton West and for Britain
